description: |-
  Validate that a string does not match any of the provided disallowed values.
---

# function: not_in_list

Returns true when the input string is not present in the list of disallowed values.

## Example Usage

```terraform
locals {
  disallowed_colors = ["red", "blue"]
  sample_values     = ["green", "yellow"]
}

output "not_in_list_example" {
  value = [
    for v in local.sample_values : {
      value = v
      valid = provider::validatefx::not_in_list(v, local.disallowed_colors, false)
    }
  ]
}
```

## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
not_in_list(value string, disallowed list of string, ignore_case bool) bool
```

## Arguments

<!-- arguments generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `value` (String, Nullable) String value to validate.
1. `disallowed` (List of String) List of disallowed string values.
1. `ignore_case` (Boolean, Nullable) Whether comparisons are case-insensitive.
